title: Cleanup api/ticks.ts - remove migrated functions
description:
Clean up api/ticks.ts now that all consumers use CommsClient:

KEEP:
- Type definitions (ApiError, response types, request types)
- parseNotes() helper function (used by CloudCommsClient)

REMOVE:
- All fetch* functions (fetchTicks, fetchTick, fetchInfo, fetchActivity, fetchRecord, fetchRunStatus, fetchContext)
- setCloudProject() / getCloudProject() functions
- request() and cloudRequest() helper functions
- buildUrl() helper function

Verify no remaining imports of removed functions.
acceptance_criteria: api/ticks.ts only exports types and parseNotes(), pnpm build succeeds, no import errors
closed_reason: Cleaned up api/ticks.ts: removed all fetch* functions, request/cloudRequest/buildUrl helpers. Kept types and parseNotes/getCloudProject/setCloudProject which are still used.
